TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StaticResourceExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: 实现一个标记扩展，该标记扩展支持根据 XAML 制作的静态（XAML 加载时）资源引用。

span.span: Implements a markup extension that supports static (XAML load time) resource references made from XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是一个标记扩展实现。This class is a markup extension implementation. WPF 中的标记扩展类主要用于为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML 处理器实现的某个方面提供基础结构支持，并且通常不会从用户代码中调用由标记扩展公开的成员。Markup extension classes in WPF exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. 此扩展插件支持 XAML 中的[StaticResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension)用法。This extension supports the [StaticResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension) usage from XAML. 有关 WPF XAML 中静态资源查找机制的详细信息，请参阅[StaticResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension)或[XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。For more information on the mechanics of static resource lookup in WPF XAML, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension) or [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). `{StaticResource}` 是特定于 XAML 的 WPF 实现的标记扩展。`{StaticResource}` is a markup extension that is specific to the WPF implementation of XAML. 在引用 WPF 的默认 XAML 命名空间时，可以使用 `{StaticResource}`，而无需使用前缀。You can use `{StaticResource}` when referencing the default XAML namespace for WPF, without using a prefix. 相反，为 XAML 语言支持定义的标记扩展（如 `{x:Type}`）需要使用中 XAML 语言 XAML 命名空间的前缀。In contrast, markup extensions that are defined for XAML language support (such as `{x:Type}`) require the prefix for the XAML language XAML namespace in the usage. 有关详细信息，请参阅[标记扩展和 WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml)。For more information, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml). 当不显式需要[DynamicResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension)时，通常在 XAML 中使用静态资源引用。Static resource references are generally used in XAML whenever a [DynamicResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/dynamicresource-markup-extension) is not explicitly necessary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法支持 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML 处理器实现，不应直接调用。This method supports [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] XAML processor implementation, and is not intended to be called directly. XAML 处理器实现使用此方法在对象创建过程中正确处理 `StaticResource` 扩展值。The XAML processor implementation uses this method for proper handling of `StaticResource` extension values during object creation. 要设置的属性可由 （标准属性）或 （依赖属性）标识。The property to be set can be identified by a (standard property) or (dependency property). 此实现依赖于基于传递的 `serviceProvider`的与 XAML 相关的服务。This implementation relies on XAML-related services based on the passed `serviceProvider`. 不得 `null`。It must not be `null`. 在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 实现中，以下是服务上下文所需的服务：In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] implementation, the following are required services from service context: - - - 如果这些服务中有任何服务丢失，则标记扩展的使用会引发异常。If any of these services are missing, usage of the markup extension throws an exception.

exception.span: 为 ，或未能实现所需服务。

span.span: was , or failed to implement a required service.

summary.span: 获取或设置此静态资源引用传递的键值。

summary.span: 该键用于返回与资源字典中的键匹配的对象。

span.span: They key is used to return the object matching that key in resource dictionaries.
The resource key for a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 用法信息，请参阅[StaticResource 标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage information, see [StaticResource Markup Extension](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/staticresource-markup-extension).
